title: African Agriculture Adaptation Atlas STAC catalog
summary: This STAC contains the data used within the Africa Agriculture Adaptation Atlas project found [here](https://adaptationatlas.cgiar.org/). This includes data related to climate hazards, crop production, crop exposure to climate hazards, demographics and more across Sub-Saharan Africa.

title: USGS Landsat Collection 2 API
summary: USGS authoritative source for Landsat Collection 2 data

title: S2 for Ghana
summary: Sentinel 2 Surface Reflectance over Ghana using SIAC AC.

title: VITO (openEO)
summary: openEO API to the VITO Remote Sensing product catalog and processing services.
accessInfo: Contact [Jeroen Dries](https://remotesensing.vito.be/team/jeroen-dries) or [VITO Remote Sensing](https://remotesensing.vito.be/contact-us) for more information.
